replies.body: Why not All Random Abilities. Each player gets a random champ with random abilities picked from ALL the champions? that would be much more interesting. Imagine the potential outcomes. Or better yet, why not let people PICK all the abilities?
THIS MODE WILL TAKE MONTHS TO MAKE. YOU THINK THIS IS EASY.

hold up, karth e, amumu w, twitch q (for the invis), and swain ult (possibly cass or thresh passive for the stacking ap so they can burn very strong late). with the items of sunfire cape  and liandrys. unseen dmg that has area of effect. just sit in the middle and watch the enemy team die. :3
For the people who do not understand, these gamemodes that we are choosing are for the pros to play. Not for us.
